description: Generate YouTube video summaries instantly for free with AI
title: Free AI Youtube Video Summarizer
keywords: YouTube Video Summarizer,AI Video Summarizer,Free Video Summarizer,Free YouTube Video Summarizer,AI YouTube Video Summarizer
introduction: Chaindesk is a generative AI platform that allows businesses to create custom AI chatbots. It offers a free plan to get started quickly and various paid plans with additional features.
features: Ability to add chatbots to multiple sites
targetPeople: Businesses looking to implement custom AI chatbots

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Chaindesk offers a free plan with limited features to get started quickly.

faqs.question: Can I update my billing preferences or change my plan?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! You can update your billing preferences or change your plan at any time from your account settings. With yearly billing, you save 20% on your subscription.

faqs.question: Can I add a chatbot to multiple sites?
faqs.answer: Yes, you're able to add any chatbot to any number of sites that you want visitors to interact with.

faqs.question: Can the chatbot support multiple languages?
faqs.answer: Yes, your website can be in any language, not just English. The chatbot can also answer questions in a different language. You can also ask questions in a different language and the chatbot will be able to answer them.

faqs.question: Is custom integration available?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! If you need us to build a custom integration for your company, you can join as an enterprise customer and we can figure out a custom pricing plan for you, based on your needs.

faqs.question: Is the chatbot retrained automatically?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Starting with the first paid plan, the chatbot is automatically retrained (currently every week). You can also manually trigger a retraining.

faqs.question: What should I do if my Agent is not following instructions properly?
faqs.answer: If you observe that your Agent is not following your instructions properly, consider setting your Agent model to GPT-4-turbo to get the best possible experience.

faqs.question: How can I contact support?
faqs.answer: You can send us an email at support@chaindesk.ai or use the chat widget on the bottom right of the page.
